  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105840</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Where Do They Stand? Creating Profiles of the 2008 Presidential Candidates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo Stehen Sie? Erstellen von von Profilen 
der 2008 Präsidentenanwärter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où Se tiennent-elles ? Créer des profils 
des 2008 candidats présidentiels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde Estão? Criando perfis dos 2008 
candidatos presidenciais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove Si levano in piedi? Creazione dei 
profili dei 2008 candidati presidenziali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού στέκονται; Δημιουργία των σχεδιαγραμμάτων 
των 2008 προεδρικών υποψηφίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Dónde Están paradas? Crear perfiles de 
los 2008 candidatos presidenciales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will research the 2008 presidential candidates and create a booklet of candidate profiles that clearly differentiate each one.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erforschen Kursteilnehmer die 
2008 Präsidentenanwärter und stellen eine Broschüre der 
Bewerberprofile her, die offenbar jedes unterscheiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants rechercheront 
les 2008 candidats présidentiels et créeront un livret des profils 
de candidat qui différencient clairement chacun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes pesquisarão os 2008 
candidatos presidenciais e criarão um livreto dos perfis do candidato
que diferenciam claramente cada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi ricercheranno i 
2008 candidati presidenziali e creeranno un libretto dei profili del 
candidato che differenziano chiaramente ogni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα ερευνήσουν τους 
2008 προεδρικούς υποψηφίους και θα δημιουργήσουν ένα βιβλιάριο
των σχεδιαγραμμάτων υποψηφίων που διαφοροποιούν σαφώς καθενός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes investigarán a 
2008 candidatos presidenciales y crearán un librete de los perfiles 
del candidato que distinguen claramente cada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
